label: Former Shas party Knesset Member Yair Levy, who was sentenced last month to five years in prison, plus a fine of almost $100,000 for stealing over one hundred thousand dollars from the Shas party's non-profitable charitable organization 'El Ha"mayan', started his sentence today.
